dt: {bc}a meeting of Roman Catholic cardinals secluded continuously while choosing a pope

dt.t: The {wi}conclave{/wi} elected the new pope on the fifth ballot.

dt: {bc}a gathering of a group or association

et: Middle English, from Middle French or Medieval Latin; Middle French, from Medieval Latin, from Latin, room that can be locked up, from {it}com-{/it} + {it}clavis{/it} key {ma}{mat|clavicle|}{/ma}
shortdef: a private meeting or secret assembly; especially : a meeting of Roman Catholic cardinals secluded continuously while choosing a pope
a gathering of a group or association
